mapper.select: SELECT BNO, MENU_ID, TITLE, WRITER, TO_CHAR(REGDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') REGDATE, HIT FROM BOARD WHERE MENU_ID = #{menu_id} ORDER BY BNO DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BOARD ( BNO, MENU_ID, TITLE, CONTENT, WRITER ) VALUES ( ( SELECT NVL(MAX(BNO), 0)+1 FROM BOARD ), #{ menu_id }, #{ title }, #{ content }, #{ writer } )
